summary: Build a website for an NGO.
architectural_notes: Public contact details to display: Contact no 7979882539; WhatsApp no 8651677735; Email samarpantrust2@gmail.com; Office no 9162667748.
Office address to display: Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311.
Tagline to use on the site: "Making a Difference Since 2021".
Director of Fundraising name(s) to display: Purushotam Kumar and Chandani Kumari.
Executive Director name to display: Purushotam Kumar.
Ensure "Our Story" section references year 2021 consistently (founding/start year).
Director of Programs name(s) to display: Jitendra Kumar and Prabhu Saw.
Director of Operations name to display: Kanhaiya Kumar.
known_issues: Homepage/impact metrics copy is incorrect: shows "Countries Served: 15" but should reference states instead of countries.
Donate/pledge form shows USD currency option/label; should use Indian Rupees (INR) instead.
Office address is still not displaying correctly/has not been updated across the site (user reports the address is still wrong).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive NGO marketing website with these top-level pages/sections: Home, About, Programs/Impact, Get Involved (Volunteer), Donate, and Contact.
Apply a cohesive visual theme appropriate for an NGO and enforce it consistently across the site (color palette, typography, spacing, buttons, section layout). Do not use a blue/purple theme.

Implement the Home page with: a hero section (headline, short mission statement, primary CTA buttons), a quick impact metrics strip, featured programs preview, and a latest updates/news preview area (static content is acceptable for initial build).
Implement an About page that includes mission, vision, values, and a small team/leadership section (static content for initial build).
Implement a Programs/Impact page that lists at least 3 programs with a title, short description, and impact details (static content for initial build).
Implement a Get Involved (Volunteer) page with a volunteer interest form (name, email, area of interest, availability, message) and submit it to the backend for storage.
Implement a Contact page with a contact form (name, email, subject, message) and submit it to the backend for storage.

Implement a Donate page that clearly explains donation options and includes a non-payment “pledge” form (name, email, amount, optional message) stored in the backend. Do not integrate any payment provider in this initial build.

Add a footer with NGO basics (short mission line, quick links, social placeholders, and contact info placeholders) and ensure consistent accessibility basics (semantic headings, labeled inputs, focus styles).
Generate and include required static image assets in the frontend and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images through the backend).

Update all user-facing branding text across the website to use the NGO name "Samarpan Trust" instead of "Hope Foundation" (including header, footer, page headings/body copy where the NGO name is referenced, and the browser tab title).
Update the text content of the user-selected span element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/span[1] to display: "Office: 9162667748".
Replace placeholder contact details across the site with the provided Samarpan Trust contact information, updating at minimum the Contact page contact cards and the footer Contact section.
Add the uploaded Samarpan Trust logo as a static generated asset and update the header and footer to use this logo image consistently (including appropriate alt text).

Generate updated Samarpan Trust logo image assets from the newly uploaded file (IMG-20260214-WA0000-1.jpg) and update the site to use the new logo everywhere the current generated logo assets are referenced (header, footer, and favicon).
Update the Home page hero tagline text to exactly: "Making a Difference Since 2015" (replacing the existing "Making a Difference Since 2010" text shown in the hero badge).
Remove the "Office: 9162667748" text currently rendered inside the Home page hero headline (the highlighted span in the main H1), leaving the headline as plain hero copy without the office number.

Remove the specific Latest Updates item whose title is "New School Opens in Rural Kenya" and whose excerpt is "Thanks to our supporters, 300 children now have access to quality education." from the Home page so this content is no longer displayed anywhere on the site.
Update the Home page hero badge/tagline text to exactly: "Making a Difference Since 2021" (replacing the current "Making a Difference Since 2015" text shown in the hero badge on the Home page).

Update the impact metric copy so it no longer claims the NGO serves 15 countries; it should clearly indicate 15 states served instead (English text). Apply this change anywhere the site currently displays this specific metric.
Update the Donate page donation pledge UI to use Indian Rupees (INR) instead of USD, removing USD wording anywhere it appears on the Donate page.
Update the About page (Our Leadership Team section) so the Director of Fundraising name(s) display as "Purushotam Kumar" and "Chandani Kumari" instead of the current placeholder person.
Update the About page (Our Leadership Team section) so the team member with role "Executive Director" displays the name "Purushotam Kumar" instead of the current placeholder name.
Update the About page hero blurb so it reflects the year 2021 instead of 2010.

Update the About page “Our Story” section text to reflect the year 2021 (instead of 2010) and to state that the organization operates in 15 states (not 15 countries), removing the Kenya/countries wording currently present in that section.

Update the About page (Our Leadership Team section) so the Director of Programs name(s) display as "Jitendra Kumar" and "Prabhu Saw" instead of the current placeholder name (currently shown as "Michael Chen").
Update the About page (Our Leadership Team section) so the team member with role "Director of Operations" displays the name "Kanhaiya Kumar" instead of the current name.

On the About page leadership/team section, update the Executive Director bio text by changing the leading experience value from "15+" to "7+" so the full sentence reads exactly: "7+ years of experience in international development and humanitarian work."
On the Get Involved (Volunteer) page (/get-involved), update the main hero heading text from "Get Involved" to "Volunteer With Us".

Add Samarpan Trust office address information to the Get Involved (Volunteer) page (/get-involved) as a clearly labeled "Address" block/section, using the same address text currently used on the Contact page and in the footer: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".

On the Get Involved (Volunteer) page (/get-involved), add a new volunteer opportunity focused on environmental work with the user-facing title "Save Environment", and make it selectable in the "Area of Interest" dropdown.

Update the NGO website content to reflect that the Healthcare initiative is Active and operates in these locations: Jharkhand, Bihar, Dehli. Apply this update wherever Healthcare is presented as a program/initiative, including:
- The Get Involved (Volunteer) page’s volunteer opportunities list/card for healthcare
- The Programs & Impact page’s healthcare program card
On the Programs & Impact page, update the "Clean Water Initiative" program card so its "Locations Served" text displays exactly: "Jharkhand, Bihar" (replacing the current non-India locations list).

On the Get Involved (Volunteer) page, update the clean water volunteer opportunity to reflect the "Clean Water Initiative" and show its locations as "Jharkhand, Bihar" in the opportunity card (and ensure the user-facing title is "Clean Water Initiative").

Update the existing "Shelter & Housing" program on the Programs & Impact page so its "Locations Served" text displays exactly: "India" (replacing the current non-India locations list). Apply this change anywhere the site currently displays the "Shelter & Housing" program’s locations.

Update the "Economic Empowerment" program on the Programs & Impact page so its "Locations Served" text displays the location as "India, Jharkhand" (replacing the current non-India locations list). Apply this change anywhere the site currently displays the Economic Empowerment program’s locations.

On the Programs & Impact page, update the "Sustainable Agriculture" program card so its "Locations Served" text displays exactly: "India, Jharkhand, Bihar" (replacing the current non-India locations list).

Update the "Education for All" program so its user-facing "Locations Served" text displays exactly: "India" (remove any non-India locations) anywhere this program’s locations are shown (including the Programs & Impact page).
On the Get Involved (Volunteer) page (Express Your Interest form), add a new user-entered "Address" field so volunteers can provide their address when submitting the form.
Update the Express Your Interest form submit button text to "Express Your Interest" (when not in the pending/submitting state).
Update any user-visible year/copyright text across the site to display 2025 (do not use a dynamically computed current year).
On the Get Involved (Volunteer) page, add a new user-entered field labeled "Contact No" to the "Express Your Interest" form and include it in the data submitted when the form is submitted.
Update the frontend canister type bindings so the VolunteerInterest type includes the new contact number field and the app builds successfully end-to-end.

Update the Get Involved (Volunteer) page (/get-involved) "Our Address" block so it displays the same Samarpan Trust office address text used on the Contact page and in the footer: "Chhaperwa, Sandh, Barkagaon, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand 825311".

Audit the frontend for any remaining occurrences of the old address text currently shown on the Get Involved page ("Vill-Bhagatpur, P.O-Bhagatpur", "P.S-Bhagatpur, Dist-Samastipur", "Bihar, India - 848503") and replace/remove them so the old address is not displayed anywhere on the site.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for an NGO.
Backend: create Motoko data models and stable storage for contact messages, volunteer interests, and donation pledges; provide create + list query endpoints for each type.
Update site contact details (phone/office/WhatsApp/email) and office address across relevant sections (e.g., Contact page + footer/contact info).
Add an NGO logo to the website (generate/import logo asset and place it in header and other relevant areas).

Remove the "New School Opens in Rural Kenya" / "Thanks to our supporters, 300 children now have access to quality education." content from the website (likely the Home page latest updates/news section).
Update site tagline/hero text to: "Making a Difference Since 2021".
Fix the impact metric label/text: change "Countries Served: 15" to reflect states (e.g., "States Served: 15") since it is not 15 countries.
Update Donate page pledge form: donation amount should be in Indian Rupees (INR) and remove/replace the USD currency option/label.
Update the About/Team (leadership) section to include the Director of Fundraising name(s): Purushotam Kumar and Chandani Kumari.
Update the About/Team (leadership) section to show the Executive Director as "Purushotam Kumar".
Update the "Our Story" section content to reflect the year 2021 (e.g., founding/start year) wherever applicable.
Update site leadership/team details to include Director of Programs name(s): Jitendra Kumar and Prabhu Saw.
Update the About/Team (leadership) section to include the Director of Operations name: Kanhaiya Kumar.

Update the About/Team (leadership) section Executive Director bio/experience text: change "15+ years of experience in international development and humanitarian work" to "7+ years of experience in international development and humanitarian work".
Add the NGO office address to the "Volunteer With Us" (Get Involved/Volunteer) page.
Update the Get Involved/Volunteer page to add a "Save Environment" section/item (content about environmental initiative).
Update Get Involved/Volunteer content to include a "Healthcare" item/initiative marked as active, and list locations as: Jharkhand, Bihar, Delhi.
Add a "Clean Water Initiative" program/initiative to the website and specify its locations as: Jharkhand, Bihar.
Add a new program/initiative "Shelter & Housing" and display its location as: India.
Add a new program/initiative named "Economic Empowerment" and display its location(s) as: India, Jharkhand.
Add a new program/initiative "Sustainable Agriculture" to the website and display its location(s) as: India, Jharkhand, Bihar.
Add a new program/initiative named "Education for All" and display its location as: India.
Update Get Involved/Volunteer page CTA/button text to "Express Your Interest" (volunteer interest form).

Update the backend VolunteerInterest data model and submitVolunteerInterest endpoint to store the volunteer-provided address along with the existing fields, and ensure the frontend actor type bindings are updated accordingly.

Update the About page intro/hero copy to: "About Samarpan Trust" and "Since 2021, we've been dedicated to creating positive change in communities worldwide through education, healthcare, and sustainable development."
Update any site year/copyright text to 2025 ("Change 2025").

Ensure the About page hero section text matches the provided English copy exactly: Title: "About Samarpan Trust" and paragraph: "Since 2021, we've been dedicated to creating positive change in communities worldwide through education, healthcare, and sustainable development."
Add a user-entered "Contact No" (phone number) field to the "Express Your Interest" (volunteer interest) form and store it with the submission.
Update the backend VolunteerInterest data model and submitVolunteerInterest endpoint to store a volunteer-provided contact number ("contactNo") along with the existing VolunteerInterest fields.
